body: @arkanagucci with exception of koyanagi royal I don't really see how those other artist make a better job than Kuureishiki. Especially Takasugi Kou, that artist just draw the same face and changes the skin tone and hair style a little every time XD Not to say I mind because I enjoy it's work but I can imagine that while making a foreign the only change we will get is a skin color one. And the same for the other artist even koyanagi royal I can't imagine theme drawing the facial characteristics that would differentiate a black woman from a generic dark skin anime character.
Ara ara from Africa. Coming soon to a hentai near you...

I've suspected for a while now that much of the content being shat out by producers right now is purposefully commissioned by creeps interested in injecting subversive messages and themes into hentai culture, along with the rest of Japan's media institutions. Every day the mounting evidence supporting the thought grows
